title: Real Madrid’s Karim Benzema Wins Ballon d’Or
description: The Real Madrid forward won the voting after a season when Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo were nowhere in sight. Barcelona’s Alexia Putellas repeated as the women’s winner.
dc:creator: Rory Smith
media:description: Karim Benzema is the first French player to win the Ballon d’Or since Zinedine Zidane in 1998.
